Class Computer

java.lang.Object
Player
Computer
public class Computer
extends Player
The Computer class is a subclass of Player class that implements an AI to play the game with user in single player mode.
Since:
4/14/2020

    Computer​(java.lang.String name)
    Instantiates a new Computer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String chooseCard​(GameManagement manager)
    Chooses a card it basically iterate through player's card and chooses the first card that it's putable.
    java.lang.String chooseDrawCard​(boolean wildOrColor)
    Chooses a wild or normal draw card when the previous player has put one.

    • chooseDrawCard

      public java.lang.String chooseDrawCard​(boolean wildOrColor)
      Chooses a wild or normal draw card when the previous player has put one.
      Parameters:
      wildOrColor - if it's true previous player has put wild draw and if it's false player has put normal draw
      Returns:
      the string
